Hello!

I'm Michael,

   a full stack web developer based in Manchester, UK.

Passionate about building websites and apps with a variety of technologies, I enjoy designing the visual elements of the front end and the backend inner workings equally.

My skillset includes Javascript, ReactJS, VueJS, NodeJS and database technologies including MySQL and PostgreSQL.

Take a look at some of my projects below and don't hesitate to get in touch!

Projects

Green Oil

Custom built e-commerce website based on a sustainable bicycle oil company, using a PayPal payment API.

I visited Green Oil's website whilst looking for eco friendly oil for maintaining my bike. I saw it was in need of a redesign and realised it was a great project to take on to learn more about online payment integration.

This project gave me a great insight into integrating payment methods, using PayPal on this occasion. I also added the option to toggle between Pounds Sterling and Euros currencies.

VIEW CODE VIEW LIVE

MACA

Website for vegan animal activism group 'Manchester Animal Climate Action'.

Manchester Animal Action were in the process of rebranding to Manchester Animal Climate Action. They were also in need of a website overhaul as their original site has various design issues.

I built this new website using VueJS, basing the initial content on their original site, but improving the layout and responsiveness for different devices and screen sizes.

I also made suggestions to improve and add to the site content, such as relevant news, advice and vegan recipes etc. I'm currently working with MACA to finalise content.

VIEW CODE VIEW LIVE

Medical Illustration Database

Full stack database solution built using ReactJS, NodeJS and Postgresql.

This was built to replace an old MS Access database which had been in use since the mid 90s.

Probably my most complex project to date, but also the most enjoyable as I was able to really get to grips with the full capabilities of React.

I initially took a class based approach to building the app, but having learnt how to use React Hooks and Redux I rebuilt the app. This was a great learning experience, reviewing my original code and discovering where it could be improved to improve the functionality and reliability of the app.

VIEW CODE VIEW LIVE
Back to top

Back to my roots

I first discovered my love for programming when I was around ten years old, playing with a BBC MICRO computer. I learned how to print out my name multiple times with a loop and that's all it took to get me hooked. A few years later I taught myself Visual Basic, and from there moved on to tinkering with C++ and Assembly. Of course once I had an internet connection I began learning about HTML. I loved building something from scratch using nothing more than a simple text editor.

At some point my interest turned to photography, although I always kept my hand in programming and web design, building the occasional website for friends and colleagues. Now, with over ten years working as a clinical photographer in the NHS, I find myself being drawn back to my coding.

My experience lies primarily in the following technologies:

  • HTML and CSS
  • PHP
  • Javascript
  • ReactJS + Redux
  • VueJS + Vuex
  • NodeJS
  • Postgresql

Those are my core skills, however the fun for me will always be learning and experimenting, so I never grow tired of acquiring new skills, such as HTML Canvas.

Design Skills

Having trained and worked as a photographer and videographer, I also have extensive experience using creative editing software, in particular Adobe products including Photoshop, Illustrator and Premiere Pro.

To see some of my work take a look at theProjects page and please get in touch if you'd like to collaborate or find out more.

Get in touch...

Got a question or interested in collaborating? I'd love to hear from you!
